title: Requires collateral loan brokers, upon the request of the pawnor, to hold the pledged goods for an additional 3 months after the initial 4 months
summary: Requires collateral loan brokers, upon the request of the pawnor, to hold the pledged goods for an additional 3 months after the initial 4 months they are required to hold such goods.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to authorizing collateral loan brokers to extend the holding period for collateral for an additional three months
